svg.text:
WEAK HYPOTHESIS: andquot;The new model will be betterandquot; ├── ❌ What is andquot;betterandquot;? ├── ❌ By how much? └── ❌ For whom?
STRONG HYPOTHESIS: andquot;Implementing the neural collaborative filtering model (NCF) will increase purchase conversion rate by at least 5% for US mobile users within 7 days of exposure, without decreasing average order value by more than 2%andquot; ├── ✅ Specific intervention ├── ✅ Measurable outcome ├── ✅ Quantified expected effect ├── ✅ Defined population ├── ✅ Clear timeframe └── ✅ Guardrail conditions
